General.Name: Safeplus International Holdings Limited
General.Description: Biophan Technologies, Inc. develops and markets various technologies for the medical device industries. The company is seeking partners to monetize its patented technologies, including biothermal power supply and pulsewidth modulation technology to enhance the performance of pacemakers and neurostimulators, and photonics and nanomaterials patents. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Pittsford, New York.
General.Address: 15 Schoen Place, Pittsford, NY, United States, 14534
